sqlMap.sql: (select CO_NAME from MA_COMPANY where MASTER.CO_CODE= CO_CODE and MASTER.ND= ND) AS CO_NAME
(select ORG_NAME from V_CP_ORG where MASTER.ORG_CODE= ORG_CODE and MASTER.ND= ND) AS ORG_NAME
(select FUND_NAME from MA_CP_FUND where MASTER.FUND_CODE= FUND_CODE and MASTER.ND= ND) AS FUND_NAME
(select B_ACC_NAME from MA_BACC where MASTER.B_ACC_CODE= B_ACC_CODE and MASTER.ND= ND) AS B_ACC_NAME
(select OUTLAY_NAME from MA_OUTLAYTYPE where MASTER.OUTLAY_CODE= OUTLAY_CODE and MASTER.ND= ND) AS OUTLAY_NAME
(select PD_PROJECT_NAME from V_CP_PROJECT where MASTER.PROJECT_CODE= PD_PROJECT_CODE ) AS PROJECT_NAME
(select PD_PROJECT_NAME from GK_PROJECT_DETAIL_V where MASTER.PROJECT_DETAIL_CODE= PD_PROJECT_CODE ) AS PROJECT_DETAIL_NAME
(select MANAGE_NAME from MA_CP_MANAGE where MASTER.MANAGE_CODE= MANAGE_CODE and MASTER.ND= ND) AS MANAGE_NAME
(select PAYOUT_NAME from MA_CP_PAYOUT where MASTER.PAYOUT_CODE= PAYOUT_CODE and MASTER.ND= ND) AS PAYOUT_NAME
(select PAYTYPE_NAME from MA_CP_PAYTYPE where MASTER.PAYTYPE_CODE= PAYTYPE_CODE and MASTER.ND= ND) AS PAYTYPE_NAME
(select OPERATION_TYPE_NAME from MA_CP_OPERATION_TYPE where MASTER.OPERATION_TYPE_CODE= OPERATION_TYPE_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND) AS OPERATION_TYPE_NAME
(select BAL_MODE_NAME from MA_CP_BAL_MODE where MASTER.BAL_MODE_CODE= BAL_MODE_CODE and MASTER.ND= ND) AS BAL_MODE_NAME
(select ORIGIN_NAME from MA_CP_ORIGIN where MASTER.ORIGIN_CODE= ORIGIN_CODE and MASTER.ND= ND) AS ORIGIN_NAME
(select INCEPTDOC_NAME from MA_CP_INCEPTDOC where MASTER.INCEPTDOC_CODE = INCEPTDOC_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND) AS INCEPTDOC_NAME
(select SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME from MA_CP_SENDDOC_TYPE where MASTER.SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE = SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND) AS SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME
(select SENDDOC_NAME from MA_CP_SENDDOC where MASTER.SENDDOC_CODE = SENDDOC_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND) AS SENDDOC_NAME
(select EXTEND_NAME from MA_CP_EXTEND where MASTER.D_ATTR1 = EXTEND_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND and EXTEND_TYPE='01') AS D_ATTR1_NAME
(select EXTEND_NAME from MA_CP_EXTEND where MASTER.D_ATTR2 = EXTEND_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND and EXTEND_TYPE='02') AS D_ATTR2_NAME
(select EXTEND_NAME from MA_CP_EXTEND where MASTER.D_ATTR3 = EXTEND_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND and EXTEND_TYPE='03') AS D_ATTR3_NAME
(select EXTEND_NAME from MA_CP_EXTEND where MASTER.D_ATTR4 = EXTEND_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND and EXTEND_TYPE='04') AS D_ATTR4_NAME
(select EXTEND_NAME from MA_CP_EXTEND where MASTER.D_ATTR5 = EXTEND_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND and EXTEND_TYPE='05') AS D_ATTR5_NAME
(select BI_MONEY from BI_BALANCE where MASTER.BI_BALANCE_ID= BI_BALANCE_ID and MASTER.ND= ND ) AS BI_MONEY
(select EXT_MONEY1 from BI_BALANCE where MASTER.BI_BALANCE_ID= BI_BALANCE_ID and MASTER.ND= ND ) AS EXT_MONEY1
(select EXT_MONEY2 from BI_BALANCE where MASTER.BI_BALANCE_ID= BI_BALANCE_ID and MASTER.ND= ND ) AS EXT_MONEY2
(select BI_MONEY-BI_ASSIGN_MONEY-AM_MONEY-DP_MONEY-CP_MONEY-LP_MONEY-FREEZE_MONEY-CD_MONEY from BI_BALANCE where MASTER.BI_BALANCE_ID= BI_BALANCE_ID and MASTER.ND= ND ) AS BI_BALANCE
(select AM_MONEY+DP_MONEY+CP_MONEY+LP_MONEY from BI_BALANCE where MASTER.BI_BALANCE_ID= BI_BALANCE_ID and MASTER.ND= ND ) As BI_PAYSUM
(select BANK_NAME from MA_BANK where MASTER.BANK_CODE = BANK_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND) AS BANK_NAME
(select BANK_NO from MA_BANK where MASTER.BANK_CODE = BANK_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND) AS BANK_NO
(select BANKNODE_NAME from MA_BANKNODE where MASTER.BANKNODE_CODE = BANKNODE_CODE and MASTER.BANK_CODE = BANK_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND) AS BANKNODE_NAME
(select CONTRACT_NAME from MA_CP_CONTRACT where MASTER.CONTRACT_CODE = CONTRACT_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND) AS CONTRACT_NAME
(SELECT bank_code FROM ma_bank_acc WHERE co_code = MASTER.co_code AND nd = MASTER.Nd AND acco_type = '04' AND upper(is_used)='Y') AS BANK_CODE
(SELECT banknode_code FROM ma_bank_acc WHERE co_code = MASTER.co_code AND nd = MASTER.Nd AND acco_type = '04' AND upper(is_used)='Y') AS BANKNODE_CODE
(select BANK_NAME from MA_BANK where MASTER.AGENT_BANK_CODE = BANK_CODE and MASTER.ND = ND) AS AGENT_BANK_NAME
(SELECT VAL FROM AS_VAL WHERE VALSET_ID = 'VS_BB_STATUS' AND VAL_ID = MASTER.A_STATUS_CODE) AS A_STATUS_NAME
(select BI_MONEY from BI_BALANCE where MASTER.TARGET_BALANCE_ID= BI_BALANCE_ID and MASTER.ND= ND AND BI_LEVEL='03') AS BI_MONEY

(select BI_MONEY-BI_ASSIGN_MONEY-AM_MONEY-DP_MONEY-CP_MONEY-LP_MONEY-FREEZE_MONEY-CD_MONEY from BI_BALANCE where MASTER.TARGET_BALANCE_ID= BI_BALANCE_ID and MASTER.ND= ND AND BI_LEVEL='03') AS BI_BALANCE
(select AM_MONEY+DP_MONEY+CP_MONEY+LP_MONEY from BI_BALANCE where MASTER.TARGET_BALANCE_ID= BI_BALANCE_ID and MASTER.ND= ND AND BI_LEVEL='03') As BI_PAYSUM
(SELECT VAL FROM AS_VAL WHERE VALSET_ID = 'VS_BB_A_STATUS_CODE_ALL' AND VAL_ID = MASTER.A_STATUS_CODE) AS A_STATUS_NAME
